content.question: If the price of the Swedish krona changes from 12 Japanese yen per krona to 13 Japanese yen per krona, then which of the following describes the change in the yen and the change in the cost of Swedish goods to residents of Japan?

choices.label: YenChange in Cost of Swedish Goods to Residents of JapanDepreciationIncrease
YenChange in Cost of Swedish Goods to Residents of JapanDepreciationDecrease
Yen Change in Cost of Swedish Goods to Residents of Japan Depreciation No change
YenChange in Cost of Swedish Goods to Residents of JapanAppreciationIncrease
YenChange in Cost of Swedish Goods to Residents of JapanAppreciationDecrease

content.answer: YenChange in Cost of Swedish Goods to Residents of JapanDepreciationIncrease

unit.text: 6: Open Economy - International Trade and Finance

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Interpret a specific economic outcome using quantitative data or calculations.
